comment.body:
I gave the user rule below a try, but it still breaks https://login.portfolioonline.com.au<https://login.portfolioonline.com.au/>
The only thing that works for me is to disable protect from DPI

From: zloyden ***@***.***>
Sent: Thursday, 6 April 2023 4:39 PM
To: AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters ***@***.***>
Cc: Anthony ***@***.***>; Mention ***@***.***>
Subject: Re: [AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters] login.portfolioonline.com.au (Issue #147404)


Strange, but I don't see any problem with that option.
Could you open the site with this rule in User rules?

@@||portfolioonline.com.au^$stealth

-
Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub<https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/147404#issuecomment-1498565563>, or unsubscribe<https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AEDKYWDCTL5N5ILOWGKEBQTW7ZQJJANCNFSM6AAAAAAWSVUTDA>.
You are receiving this because you were mentioned.Message ID: ***@***.******@***.***>>

issue.title: Cashapp

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4 0

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers, Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Microsoft Edge

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.squareup.cash

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Widgets filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, AdGuard DNS filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

uxh52u-dlsdk.appsflyersdk.com

We can add dlsdk.appsflyersdk.com without the || or -

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
> The problem is its unblocked. Appsflyer is an ad domain

Wrong domain added. Theres an appsflyersdk and an appsflyer
